template.name: qRT-PCR SYBR Green
template.description: Contains information on measured variables and experimental metadata.

templateField.name: Gene Full-Name(s)
templateField.comment: Full name(s) of the target gene, e.g. NCBI definition.

templateField.name: Target Gene Symbol (HGNC)
templateField.comment: Name of the target gene using HGNC term (for human subjects)

templateField.name: Gene Ontology
templateField.comment: NCBI code GI code For the gene of interest

templateField.name: Gene_Forward primer
templateField.comment: Forward primer; orientation given as standard: 5'-3' (nt)

templateField.name: Gene_Reverse primer
templateField.comment: Reverse primer: orientation given as standard: 5'-3' (nt)

templateField.name: Annealing temperature (Tm)_Target Gene primers
templateField.comment: Annealing temperature of the primer pair for the gene of interest.

templateField.name: Reference Gene Full-Name(s)
templateField.comment: Full name(s) of the reference (housekeeping or control) gene, e.g. NCBI definition.

templateField.name: Reference Gene Symbol (HGNC)
templateField.comment: Name of the reference (housekeeping or control) gene, using HGNC term (for human subjects).

templateField.name: Reference Gene Ontology
templateField.comment: NCBI code GI code For the reference (housekeeping or control) gene.

templateField.name: Reference Gene_Forward primer
templateField.comment: Orientation given as standard: 5'-3'

templateField.name: Reference Gene_Reverse primer
templateField.comment: Orientation given as standard: 5'-3'

templateField.name: Annealing temperature (Tm)_Reference Gene primers
templateField.comment: Annealing temperature of the primer pair for the reference gene.

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Description on how the qRT-PCR was performed. (can be reference to a published article or an online site with the protocol)

templateField.name: Machine used for qRT-PCR (manufacturer)
templateField.comment: Description on what type of machine the experiment was performed.

templateField.name: Software used for analysis of qRT-PCR results
templateField.comment: Name of software (+version) used for analysis of qRT-PCR.

templateField.name: Experimental protocol
templateField.comment: Experimental protocol describing how detection for methylation of the gene of interest was performed.

templateField.name: Analysis/calculation unit value of the measured feature
templateField.comment: Calculation/formula for obtaining processed data measurements (e.g. for a target gene compared to reference gene)

templateField.name: Additional information
templateField.comment: E.g. information on DNA isolation and bisulphite modification could be referred to here. In case primers and probes are from a published article, could refer to article here as well.

template.name: MLPA gain P146-A1
template.description: Features for the MLPA kit, gain P146-A1 from MRC Holland.

templateField.name: Chromosomal position
templateField.comment: Chromosomal position of the probes in the kit.

templateField.name: Gene (kit name)
templateField.comment: Gene name as supplied by the MLPA kit.

templateField.name: Recommended order
templateField.comment: Recommended order as suggested by the MLPA kit supplier.

templateField.name: Product information_Lot# kit
templateField.comment: Lot# of the product used for the experiments

templateField.name: Normalisation method
templateField.comment: Normalisation method applied to MLPA data (tumor or population analysis)

templateField.name: Average/Median normalisation
templateField.comment: Whether average or median was applied on normalisation factor in MLPA experiment.

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Description on how the qRT-PCR was performed. (can be reference to a published article or an online site with the protocol)

templateField.name: Additional information
templateField.comment: E.g. information on DNA isolation and bisulphite modification could be referred to here. In case primers and probes are from a published article, could refer to article here as well.

templateField.name: Experimental protocol
templateField.comment: Experimental protocol describing how detection for methylation of the gene of interest was performed.

template.name: MLPA loss X-006
template.description: Features for the MLPA kit, loss X-006 from MRC Holland.

templateField.name: Chromosomal position
templateField.comment: Chromosomal position of the probes in the kit.

templateField.name: Gene (kit name)
templateField.comment: Gene name as supplied by the MLPA kit.

templateField.name: Recommended order
templateField.comment: Recommended order as suggested by the MLPA kit supplier.

templateField.name: Product information_Lot# kit
templateField.comment: Lot# of the product used for the experiments

templateField.name: Normalisation method
templateField.comment: Normalisation method applied to MLPA data (tumor or population analysis)

templateField.name: Average/Median normalisation
templateField.comment: Whether average or median was applied on normalisation factor in MLPA experiment.

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Description on how the qRT-PCR was performed. (can be reference to a published article or an online site with the protocol)

templateField.name: Additional information
templateField.comment: E.g. information on DNA isolation and bisulphite modification could be referred to here. In case primers and probes are from a published article, could refer to article here as well.

templateField.name: Experimental protocol
templateField.comment: Experimental protocol describing how detection for methylation of the gene of interest was performed.

templateField.name: Gene Full-Name(s)
templateField.comment: Full name(s) of the target gene, e.g. NCBI definition.

templateField.name: Gene Ontology
templateField.comment: NCBI code GI code For the gene of interest

templateField.name: Target Gene Symbol (HGNC)
templateField.comment: Name of the target gene using HGNC term (for human subjects)

templateField.name: Gene_Unmethylated DNA Forward primer
templateField.comment: Gene: Unmethylated DNA Forward primer Orientation given as standard: 5'-3'

templateField.name: Gene_Unmethylated DNA Reverse primer
templateField.comment: Gene: Unmethylated DNA Reverseprimer Orientation given as standard: 5'-3'

templateField.name: Gene_Unmethylated DNA primers: Location relative to TSS
templateField.comment: Location relative to transcription start site (TSS) in basepairs (bp). Primer pair recognises unmethylated DNA.

templateField.name: Gene: Methylated DNA Forward primer
templateField.comment: Gene: Methylated DNA Forward primer Orientation given as standard: 5'-3'

templateField.name: Gene: Methylated DNA Reverse primer
templateField.comment: Gene: Methylated DNA Reverse primer Orientation given as standard: 5'-3'

templateField.name: Gene: Methylated DNA primers: Location relative to TSS
templateField.comment: Location relative to transcription start site (TSS) in basepairs (bp). Primer pair recognises methylated DNA.

templateField.name: Gene: Molecular beacon sequence
templateField.comment: Gene: Molecular beacon used for detection Orientation given as standard: 5'-3'

templateField.name: Annealing temperature (Tm) of gene of interest; both primer pairs
templateField.comment: Annealing temperature of both the primer pairs for unmethylated, as well as methylated DNA; for the gene of interest.

templateField.name: Gene: Molecular beacon: Location relative to TSS
templateField.comment: Location relative to transcription start site (TSS) in basepairs (bp). For the gene of interest.

templateField.name: Annealing temperature (Tm) of the reference gene; both primer pairs
templateField.comment: Annealing temperature of both the primer pairs for unmethylated, as well as methylated DNA; for the reference gene.

templateField.name: Reference Gene Full-Name(s)
templateField.comment: Full name(s) of the reference (housekeeping or control) gene, e.g. NCBI definition.

templateField.name: Reference Gene Ontology
templateField.comment: NCBI code GI code For the reference (housekeeping or control) gene.

templateField.name: Reference Gene Symbol (HGNC)
templateField.comment: Name of the reference (housekeeping or control) gene, using HGNC term (for human subjects).

templateField.name: Reference Gene: Unmethylated DNA forward primer
templateField.comment: Reference Gene: Unmethylated DNA forward primer Orientation given as standard: 5'-3'

templateField.name: Reference Gene: Unmethylated DNA reverse primer
templateField.comment: Reference Gene_Unmethylated DNA reverse primer Orientation given as standard: 5'-3'

templateField.name: Reference Gene: Methylated DNA forward primer
templateField.comment: Reference Gene: Methylated DNA forward primer Orientation given as standard: 5'-3'

templateField.name: Reference Gene: Methylated DNA reverse primer
templateField.comment: Reference Gene: Methylated DNA reverse primer Orientation given as standard: 5'-3'

templateField.name: Reference Gene: Molecular beacon sequence
templateField.comment: Reference Gene: Molecular beacon Orientation given as standard: 5'-3'

templateField.name: Reference Gene: Molecular beacon: Location relative to TSS
templateField.comment: Location relative to transcription start site (TSS) in basepairs (bp). For the reference gene.

templateField.name: Experimental protocol
templateField.comment: Experimental protocol describing how detection for methylation of the gene of interest was performed.

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Description on how the qRT-PCR was performed. (can be reference to a published article or an online site with the protocol)

templateField.name: Machine used for detection
templateField.comment: e.g. for detection of a qRT-PCR or qMSP, Taqman 7500 from Applied Biosystems was used.

template.name: High Resolution Melting (dye)
template.description: Features belonging to the technique High Resolution Melting, performed with a dye.

templateField.name: Target Gene Symbol (HGNC)
templateField.comment: Name of the target gene using HGNC term (for human subjects)

templateField.name: Target Gene Full Name(s)
templateField.comment: Target gene full name(s)

templateField.name: Gene_Forward primer
templateField.comment: Forward primer; orientation given as standard: 5'-3' (nt)

templateField.name: Annealing temperature (Tm)_Target Gene primers
templateField.comment: Annealing temperature of the primer pair for the gene of interest.

templateField.name: Gene_Reverse primer
templateField.comment: Reverse primer: orientation given as standard: 5'-3' (nt)

templateField.name: Exon number
templateField.comment: Exon number of the target gene.

templateField.name: Target Gene ID code
templateField.comment: Target gene ID code

templateField.name: Amplicon size
templateField.comment: Expected size/ length of amplicon.

templateField.name: Additional information
templateField.comment: E.g. information on DNA isolation and bisulphite modification could be referred to here. In case primers and probes are from a published article, could refer to article here as well.

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Description on how the qRT-PCR was performed. (can be reference to a published article or an online site with the protocol)

templateField.name: Product information_Lot# kit
templateField.comment: Lot# of the product used for the experiments

template.name: MSI Analysis System
template.description: MB version for the Cell line use case. Variables in this are for the 5 markers in the kit and the overall call of microsatellite (in)stable.

templateField.name: Marker name
templateField.comment: MSI Analysis System, version1.2 marker name. From the kit.

templateField.name: GenBank number
templateField.comment: MSI Analysis System, version1.2 GenBank number. As stated in the kit information.

templateField.name: Major Repeat Sequence
templateField.comment: MSI Analysis System, version1.2 Marker Repeat Sequence. As stated in the kit information.

templateField.name: Size range
templateField.comment: Estimated size the peaks should appear in the MSI Analysis System. As stated in the kit information.

templateField.name: K562 alleles
templateField.comment: K562 alleles from the MSI Analysis System, version 1.2. As stated in kit information.

templateField.name: Primer dye
templateField.comment: Primer dye used as reporter in the MSI Analysis System version 1.2. As stated in the kit information.

templateField.name: Product number
templateField.comment: For MSI Analysis System (Promega) version 1.2.

templateField.name: Additional information
templateField.comment: E.g. information on DNA isolation and bisulphite modification could be referred to here. In case primers and probes are from a published article, could refer to article here as well.

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Description on how the qRT-PCR was performed. (can be reference to a published article or an online site with the protocol)

templateField.name: Negative control sample(s) used
templateField.comment: Negative control used in the MSI Analysis System verion 1.2.

templateField.name: Positive control sample(s) used
templateField.comment: Positive control used in the MSI Analysis System version 1.2.

template.name: High Resolution Melting (probe)
template.description: Features belonging to the technique High Resolution Melting, performed with a probe.

templateField.comment: Target gene full name(s)

templateField.comment: Target gene ID code

templateField.name: Amplicon size
templateField.comment: Expected size/ length of amplicon.

templateField.name: Annealing temperature target gene primers with probe
templateField.comment: Annealing temperature target gene primers with probe. Used for HRM PCR (LC480).

templateField.comment: E.g. information on DNA isolation and bisulphite modification could be referred to here. In case primers and probes are from a published article, could refer to article here as well.

template.name: qMSP SYBR Green
template.description: Contains information on measured variables and experimental metadata.

templateField.name: Target Gene Symbol (HGNC)
templateField.comment: Name of the target gene using HGNC term (for human subjects)

templateField.name: Gene Full-Name(s)
templateField.comment: Full name(s) of the target gene, e.g. NCBI definition.

templateField.name: Gene Ontology
templateField.comment: NCBI code GI code For the gene of interest

templateField.name: Gene_Forward primer
templateField.comment: Forward primer; orientation given as standard: 5'-3' (nt)

templateField.name: Gene_Reverse primer
templateField.comment: Reverse primer: orientation given as standard: 5'-3' (nt)

templateField.name: Target gene_Location relative to TSS
templateField.comment: Chosen location in CpG island, relative to Transcription Start Site (TSS). For the target gene.

templateField.name: Annealing temperature (Tm)_Target Gene primers
templateField.comment: Annealing temperature of the primer pair for the gene of interest.

templateField.name: Reference Gene Symbol (HGNC)
templateField.comment: Name of the reference (housekeeping or control) gene, using HGNC term (for human subjects).

templateField.name: Reference Gene Full-Name(s)
templateField.comment: Full name(s) of the reference (housekeeping or control) gene, e.g. NCBI definition.

templateField.name: Reference Gene Ontology
templateField.comment: NCBI code GI code For the reference (housekeeping or control) gene.

templateField.name: Reference Gene_Forward primer
templateField.comment: Orientation given as standard: 5'-3'

templateField.name: Reference Gene_Reverse primer
templateField.comment: Orientation given as standard: 5'-3'

templateField.name: Regerence gene_Location relative to TSS
templateField.comment: Chosen location in CpG island, relative to Transcription Start Site (TSS). For the reference gene.

templateField.name: Annealing temperature (Tm)_Reference Gene primers
templateField.comment: Annealing temperature of the primer pair for the reference gene.

templateField.name: Description
templateField.comment: Description on how the qRT-PCR was performed. (can be reference to a published article or an online site with the protocol)

templateField.name: Experimental protocol
templateField.comment: Experimental protocol describing how detection for methylation of the gene of interest was performed.

templateField.name: Analysis/calculation unit value of the measured feature
templateField.comment: Calculation/formula for obtaining processed data measurements (e.g. for a target gene compared to reference gene)

templateField.name: Additional information
templateField.comment: E.g. information on DNA isolation and bisulphite modification could be referred to here. In case primers and probes are from a published article, could refer to article here as well.

templateField.name: Machine used for detection
templateField.comment: e.g. for detection of a qRT-PCR or qMSP, Taqman 7500 from Applied Biosystems was used.

template.name: ABI3500 sequencing
template.description: For features traditional Sanger sequencing. In this case done with the ABI3500 from Applied Biosystems.

templateField.name: Note on unit
templateField.comment: Explanation of the unit. Primarily used in this version of Phenotype Db to explain numerically categorised feature measurements.

templateField.comment: Name of the target gene using HGNC term (for human subjects)

templateField.name: Target Gene Full Name(s)
templateField.comment: Target gene full name(s)

templateField.comment: Target gene ID code

templateField.name: Exon number
templateField.comment: Exon number of the target gene.

templateField.name: M13 sequencing primer
templateField.comment: Reverse primer: orientation given as standard: 5'-3' (nt)

templateField.name: Annealing temperature
templateField.comment:
Annealing temperature
(used for a single primer)
